thread.title: Debra Lynn Holkestad
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Debra Lynn Holkestad

author: Debra Lynn Holkestad
title: Debra Lynn Holkestad
text: Patrick was very helpful with planning ,insurance, resort selection and information about the destination. We were happy with the ,Palm Grove. The setting and beach were great. There were lots of Canadians there. He arranged for early check in and late check out. Due to flight times, this made things much easier for us.. We ran into some problems with the last two segment of our air travel on the way home. We were told that we could only get boarding passes to LAX because the last two segments were not booked at the same time as the others. We had a short window of time to clear customs, get to the domestic terminal, go to the Air Canada Desk for our last two boarding passes, check our luggage and clear security .Our LA to Vancouver boarding passes had assigned seats, but the Vancouver to Kelowna segment had "gate" printed in the seat area. On arrival in Vancouver we went to the gate as soon as it opened to be told that the flight was oversold and there was only one seat available. After travelling for more than 24 hours we were quite distressed. We explained that the tickets were booked and paid for quite some time ago. After about half an hour, they offered another passenger compensation for giving up a seat. This was not a good way to end a fabulous vacation l
